item.title: CVE-2024-1418|2024-06-04T18:00:33.775Z -- mordauk -- cgc%20maintenance%20mode
item.description: The CGC Maintenance Mode plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.2 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view protected posts via REST API even when maintenance mode is enabled.
